about_the_game:
Explore the vastness of strategic gameplay with our space-themed board game! players use star-currency to acquire interstellar sites. Challenge friends in turn-based, single-device matches, competing to dominate the board. Introducing the Starbridge feature, players can pay a small fee to traverse half the cells, adding a tactical twist. Accumulate star-currency to unlock the thrilling Lottery, where top performers receive rewards, and random sites experience a 25% value boost. Take loan to settle amount due to opponents and also to invest on upgrading your properties.Immerse yourself in this cosmic twist on a classic board game, where financial prowess and strategic mastery lead to stellar success!

FEATURES

Starbiz has unique features which suit perfectly the objectives of the game which is to provide a good leisure time to the players.
The features must be well mastered by the players if they want to excel in this Pc Family Trading board game.
The attributes are simple to understand and the players will have a real pleasure in getting acquainted to this pc family game.
The various features are summarized below:

Buying and selling sites/stars and their respective upgrades without any restriction as soon as the user completes one lap.

Lottery : Each player can collect and buy lotteries in the game.
The lotteries can be bought at normal and discount price .
When lotteries bought are in the range of 38 to 40, there is a lottery draw.
There are two winners at each lottery draw.

Bidirectional star bridge: This feature is very important indeed.
It enables the users to bypass two galaxies.4 starbridges are available on the 4 corners of the board
The player will decrease his chances of landing on an opponent's site and hence will not pay the due commission.

GAME STRATEGY:Players can downgrade properties ,earn cash and upgrade other propety/ies on his turn, normally done when opponents are approaching his sites/properties.Lowest and highiest properties and also appreciated properties in each galaxy are strategic investment...use starbridge when finding most opponent properties on the 2 galaxies to bypass.Take loan when available for further investment to buy new properties and for upgrade even player have enough cash to settle amount due.

Appreciated property and draw: Invest on an appreciated property and earn 25% more on the investment with the appreciation draw.

properties are also appreciated through 4 starcards

Loan: Upon satisfaction of some conditions, a player can obtain either a loan of 2000 or 1500 payable within 6 instalments\turns at a low interest of 5% per instalment\turn.
Only 2 loans are permitted for each player

Starcards: There are 46 starcards.
Players will have the possibility of taking yellow,green and either a yellow or green card.They will be collecting money,paying fines\penalties,collect and also buy lotteries at a discount as per their location i.e. at different rates for each galaxy.

12 unique starcards:These cards can make a player move to the next or previous galaxy and may land on any of the 24 properties.Hence the owner of the property can earn uexpected cash...
